select u.id, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.email, u.phone_num, u.role, u.status, l.id lawyer_id, l.origin_profile_name, l.uploard_profile_name, l.origin_license_name, l.uploard_license_name, l.introduction, l.law_firm, l.office_num, l.counseling_amount from user_tb u left join lawyer_detail_tb l on u.id = l.user_id where u.role = 'lawyer' order by field(status, 0, 1, 2)

select count(*) > 0 from post_tb where id = #{id}
